Name: PixHunter
About the game: We are at war! Important point ➡ 52 new levels! ➡ Daily rewards! ➡ 4 exclusive cards! ➡ Purchase and improvement of aircraft! ➡ Aircraft control with joystick! ➡ Addictive! There can't be any left! In PixHunter you must shoot down all enemy aircraft you encounter during your missions. But be careful! They will become stronger and more trained. Be precise and dodge enemy fire! You will cover 52 new levels aboard fighter planes, you will be able to unlock more and more robust and powerful with victory rewards and daily mission bonuses! Unlock the battle cards to add these war zones to your soldier's list! Your assets in the levels: - Protective shield - Double / triple barrel - Intensive care Will you be the first to end this war? Share your scores and battle photos in the Steam community of fighter pilots. Soldier, imminent departure on mission!
